title: Generate Transcription
description: Upload an audio file or enter a YouTube URL. The system will generate an accurate transcription of the spoken content.
reminder: Transcripts are stored securely and can be used for summaries and study tools.

title: Generate Summarize
description: Generate concise summaries from your transcript. Choose between bullet points, key insights, or detailed explanations.
reminder: Summaries help condense large amounts of information for quick review.

title: Generate Flashcard
description: Convert key ideas from your transcript into AI-generated flashcards for active recall and spaced repetition.
reminder: You can review flashcards anytime to reinforce learning.

title: Generate Quiz
description: Test your knowledge with AI-generated quizzes based on the transcription content. Includes multiple-choice and written-response questions.
reminder: Quizzes help you assess comprehension and retention of key information.
